body.name: EKEN Doorbell Camera Wireless with AI Smart Human Detection, Cloud Storage, HD Live Image, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Included Ring Chime, IP65 Waterproof, 2.4Ghz WiFi Only, Battery Powered
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 11 mins
features: Robust 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Connectivity: Designed for exclusive compatibility with 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi, the EKEN doorbell camera guarantees fast and stable connections. (5GHz Wi-Fi is not supported)
Real-Time Two-Way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere, enabling seamless real-time interaction.

Secure Cloud Storage Solution: Enjoy AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately). Explore a 30-day free trial for seamless recording, reviewing, and sharing of your videos.
AI-Powered Human Detection: Rely on advanced AI technology for accurate people identification, while filtering out irrelevant moving objects like cars and trees.

Bonus Chime for Your Convenience: Set up the included doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or terrace for instant alerts when someone rings the doorbell. Connect one smart doorbell with multiple chimes for greater flexibility.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep an eye on your home safety

Chime Included: Place the included doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or courtyard to hear when someone rings your doorbell. One smart doorbell can be paired with multiple indoor chimes. Weather-Resistant: IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification ensures the video doorbell can withstand rain, sun, heat, or chill, providing reliable security all year round. Enjoy reliable surveillance, even in extreme weather conditions.

AI-Powered Human Detection Rely on advanced AI technology for accurate people identification, while filtering out irrelevant moving objects like cars and trees. Two-Way Communication Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere, enabling seamless real-time interaction. Share with Family You can share this video doorbell camera to 8 family accounts, and 3 of you could view online in the same time. Superior Night Vision A smart IR sensor allow continuous surveillance, producing clear videos even in dimly lit conditions.

Is the doorbell camera compatible with 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera only works with 2.4G Wi-Fi. You'll need to have separate networks for 2.4GHz and 5GHz Wi-Fi. Make sure they have different names, and connect the camera to the 2.4GHz network. Do I need to buy an SD memory card for this doorbell camera? This doorbell camera doesn't use SD cards; it stores videos in the cloud. Can I install the doorbell camera easily? Yes, it's easy. The user manual has all the steps. How many users can view the doorbell camera at the same time? The main account can allow access to the device for 8 other accounts. While 3 users can watch the video simultaneously, only one can use the intercom at a time. Can this doorbell camera withstand weather or is it waterproof? No, this doorbell camera isn't waterproof, though it is weatherproof. It comes with an IP65 rating, it can withstand different weather conditions, including protection from dust and light water spray, ideal for various climates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, great price!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to set up wireless and battery life last a long time! Clear video pictures even at night. The microphone picks up everything. I stuck it on my front door in-between the screen door because I don't want anyone to steal it! The adhesive is very strong, I even moved it from outside the door to inside the screen and front door and it still stuck on great. I just recharged the battery once it got to 35% and it charged up pretty fast! The first time you have to charge for 18 or more hours before installing. But it really lasts a long time! I feel so much better now that I can see what's going on in the front driveway. You can easily customize the device to suit your needs. You have to purchase cloud service for video playback and backups but it's affordable enough that I got it for 6 months. $30 - $36 I forgot which . I would certainly recommend to anyone looking for a wireless security camera doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EKEN Doorbell Camera Wireless with AI Smart Human Detection
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the EKEN Doorbell Camera Wireless with AI Smart Human Detection, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations. The installation process was straightforward, and the wireless functionality adds a level of convenience that I truly appreciate.The AI Smart Human Detection feature is impressive, providing accurate alerts and minimizing false alarms. This not only enhances security but also ensures that I am only notified when there is genuine human activity, saving time and unnecessary interruptions.The video quality is remarkable, offering clear and crisp images both during the day and at night. The integration with the EKEN app is seamless, allowing me to monitor my doorstep from anywhere using my smartphone.In addition to its advanced features, the doorbell camera has a sleek and modern design that complements the aesthetics of my home. The build quality is robust, assuring me of its durability and long-term reliability.Overall, I highly recommend the EKEN Doorbell Camera to anyone seeking a reliable and intelligent security solution for their home. It's a valuable addition that provides peace of mind and convenience, making it a worthwhile investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Video doorbell review
reviews.reviewText: Reasonably pricedClear HD pictureSound activeReasonable battery life 5 days before rechargeFunctions reasonably well when home.Although, it seems to disconnect when away. When away is when I want to see progress at my home and I haven't figured out why it disconnects when away, even though I am on hotspot or wifi is live. That part is quite discouraging and concerning.If I'm home the video isn't necessary. It is when I am away that makes its value valuable. When in use with full sensors activated the battery life is diminished considerably causing recharging daily which was not expected.Set all settings on medium with full human sensor to get 3 to 5 days on full charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product for the price
reviews.reviewText: So far I am very satisfied with this cool little video doorbell. The picture quality is excellent and videos come out clear. The set up is super easy and there's no obligation in subscribing but can't beat paying an entire year for only $29.99. I definitely can say that I purchased a five star product. I appreciate the rechargeable battery function and since having it which has been only 7 days it still has almost a full charge. I honestly don't have any cons to report thus far. But if I do I will surly be back to follow up and update my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this product yesterday and absolutely love it. It’s very easy to install and takes about 5-10 minutes. I live in Houston and there are many house break incidents in the city. The doorbell works great and the camera is very clear to keep an eye and make sure very thing is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use and great value!
reviews.reviewText: Recently have been wanting a doorbell/front door camera to monitor who comes around to my house, for security. This was such an affordable and easy to use option. The camera has great quality, the doorbell (if you choose to set it up) is loud and I am able to hear it anywhere in my house, and the camera picks up everything! Set up was extremely easy - just attach to wifi, download an app and use the sticky application to attach it outside. No wires or complicated stuff and the batteries supplied are rechargeable and super durable and long-lasting. I recommend this item for anyone who wants a simple and easy security doorbell camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get it!!! -one happy costumer.
reviews.reviewText: I can not say how happy I am with this purchase! This little inexpensive camera does everything and anything any other name brand and expensive cameras do. It is so easy to use and install and the video quality is amazing, what I love the most is the talk back feature and how inexpensive the video storage was for a year! Can’t beat it! Please look no further this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and looks great
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell was easy to install and pair with my phone. Easy as 123. Great clear and infocus picture. Love the cloud option. This will definitely help with porch pirates
